entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
